annotations.description: The very first version was made with Gin and of course lost to time, one of the earliest printed versions of this drink came from Hugo Ensslin's book "Recipe...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Brandy Alexander

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Brandy or Cognac
1oz (30ml) Creme de Cacao
Top Heavy Cream

Mix brandy and creme de cacao over ice
Pour into coupe
Top with shaken heavy cream
Garnish with nutmeg if desired

Heavy cream: 
Fill squeeze bottle 3/4 full with heavy cream and add
.25oz (7.5ml) Creme De Cacao and .25oz (7.5ml) Carolans Irish Cream (or Bailey's)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ETv4KVCr-kA
title: Brandy Alexander
